meanings.definition: (Biblical) A Levite who was appointed to a sacred office in the time of David.
meanings.english_definition: A Levite appointed by David to a sacred office.

examples.sentence: Jehius was one of the Levites chosen by David to oversee the treasury.
examples.translation: エヒウスは、ダビデによって財務を監督するために選ばれたレビ人の一人でした。
